name: Cassette Roulette
description:
NOTE: The Rewind Player does not work properly in the browser version of the game, but it works for the PC version. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Instructions:

  • Merge two cassettes of the same type, but different state, by adding one to the Normal Player and another to the Rewind Player.
  • You can only merge a Normal Cassette and a Rewind Cassette.
  • Press and Hold the Rewind button until the cassettes' music syncs up to merge the two cassettes.
  • Convert and merge cassettes to move up the ranks and create a Golden CD.
  • For more In-game tips, Click on the "Info" Button at the bottom right of the screen.

Controls:

  • Use your Mouse to move Cassettes around.

Developers:

Chubo Zeko - GAME DESIGN & PROGRAMMING
Tutaleni Ilonga - GAME GRAPHICS & ART
Mwaaba Alec Mugala - MUSIC & SOUND DESIGN

Developed for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2.
